original_title: 秘密の‘ちびっこ躾（しつけ）’キャンプ教室
overview: "Any selfish child will learn to listen to what their parents say in one night!!" It was a facility! Parents leave their screaming children at the campsite and go home... And then a terrifying camp class just for the children begins... A devil's hand of lust stretches out to a young body
title: Disciplining Young Girls in Secret So No One Knows Camp Classroom
